ygData.subject: RE: Bard Revenge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah, ok. I still have many songs to learn - but I m not as excited about any of them as much as I am my next one.. When I get to the 16th song, I m growing
ygData.messageBody:
> nope, he means level 27 song, solon's song of the sirens that actually
> charms npcs. its fun to charm dvinn

Ah, ok. I still have many songs to learn - but I'm not as excited about any
of them as much as I am my next one.. When I get to the 16th song, I'm
growing gills and becoming a fish. =)

So what's in the lake in the West Commons anyway? Can you zone to/from the
Ocean Of Tears? Who needs a stinky boat - I'm swimming from Freeport to
Butcherblock!

PS: Did I ever mention the time I fell off the boat (or more acurately was
*placed* off the boat from the bottom deck) and took my swimming skill from
a 3 to just over 30 (takes just over an hour for those of you interested)
because I was too stubborn to let myself die and no GM's would answer me?
Thank goodness for the Jig keeping my stamina up..

PSS: Does anyone else think that there should be a merchant or a bar in the
boat? I'd love to see some drunken Bards roaming around the deck.. playing
silly songs.. falling off.. trying to swim while drunk..

PSSS: Does anyone else think it would be the greatest thing to have an
undead ferryman that you had to give a copper or silver to in order to get
across the rivers around Antonica? Could even make it some Spectre type
thing like the river Styx.. The things you think about while running nekkid
from Freeport to Qeynos screaming Selo's eh?
